"""
    Compare the modified growth function computed by CCL against the exact
    result for a particular modification of the growth rate.
    """
nz_mg = 128
z_mg = np.zeros(nz_mg)
df_mg = np.zeros(nz_mg)
for i in range(0, nz_mg):
    z_mg[i] = 4.0 * (i + 0.0) / (nz_mg - 1.0)
    df_mg[i] = 0.1 / (1.0 + z_mg[i])
cosmo1 = ccl.Cosmology(Omega_c=0.25, Omega_b=0.05, Omega_k=0.0, Neff=0.0,
    m_nu=0.0, w0=-1.0, wa=0.0, h=0.7, A_s=2.1e-09, n_s=0.96)
cosmo2 = ccl.Cosmology(Omega_c=0.25, Omega_b=0.05, Omega_k=0.0, Neff=0.0,
    m_nu=0.0, w0=-1.0, wa=0.0, h=0.7, A_s=2.1e-09, n_s=0.96, z_mg=z_mg,
    df_mg=df_mg)
a = 1.0 / (1.0 + z_mg)
d1 = ccl.growth_factor(cosmo1, a)
d2 = ccl.growth_factor(cosmo2, a)
f1 = ccl.growth_rate(cosmo1, a)
f2 = ccl.growth_rate(cosmo2, a)
f2r = f1 + 0.1 * a
d2r = d1 * np.exp(0.1 * (a - 1.0))
assert_allclose(d2r, d2, rtol=GROWTH_TOLERANCE)
assert_allclose(f2r, f2, rtol=GROWTH_TOLERANCE)
